name: Jones on Fire
description: Become Emma Jones, firefighter extraordinaire, tough cookie and kitten lover. Beat 10 levels of dangerous mountain terrain, improving Jones’ skills with every fluffy life saved. Strive for ever higher scores, and gain the adoration of millions of cats! Save the kitties! You’re their only hope! - Fast, frenetic, side-scrolling fun - Intuitive controls - Juicy running and jumping physics - Fun in short bursts, but addictive enough for longer plays - Upgrade Jones with increasingly spiffy fire-fighting skills - Blocky, retro visuals with just a touch of the modern - Rockin' tunes
